pages.text: A bow infused with demon will that fires spectral arrows powered by raw demonic energy. Unlike mundane bows, it requires no physical arrows - only the will of demons.

pages.title: Will-Powered Combat
pages.text: $(bold)Will Consumption:$() Uses demon will instead of arrows$(br)$(bold)Attunement:$() Automatically matches your highest will type$(br2)$(bold)Will Effects:$()$(li)$(#900)Raw:$() Balanced damage$(li)$(#0a0)Corrosive:$() +Poison on hit$(li)$(#f00)Destructive:$() Maximum damage$(li)$(#0af)Vengeful:$() Fast arrows$(li)$(#888)Steadfast:$() +Slowness on hit

pages.title: Additional Features
pages.text: $(bold)Soul Snare:$() All arrows apply Soul Snare, guaranteeing demon will drops from slain enemies.$(br2)$(bold)Damage Scaling:$() Arrow damage increases with your demon will reserves, similar to sentient melee weapons.$(br2)$(bold)Vanishing Arrows:$() Spectral arrows disappear after impact and cannot be picked up.$(br2)$(italic)Compatible with Power, Punch, and Flame enchantments.$()
